description: Angular component for displaying recipe details, including loading data via route parameters, handling errors, and UI interactions.

classes.name: RecipeDetailComponent
classes.description: Angular component for recipe detail view, managing recipe data loading, navigation, and UI logic.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes component and triggers recipe loading.

methods.name: ngOnDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up subscriptions on component destruction.
